name: meta-tag-analyzer
description: Generates a report after analysing the meta tags of each page on your website.
author: Clyde D'Souza

inputs.name: sitemapURL
inputs.label: Sitemap URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full URL of the sitemap file. Sitemap file must be of `.xml` file extension.    [More information](https://github.com/ClydeDz/meta-tag-analyzer/wiki#configuring-inputs)

inputs.name: outputFilename
inputs.label: Output filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom filename for the Meta Tag Analyzer report. Only type in the file name and not the file extension.    [More information](https://github.com/ClydeDz/meta-tag-analyzer/wiki#configuring-inputs)
